name: Narrator
line: "Once upon a time there was a lovely princess. But she had an enchantment upon her of a fearful sort which could only be broken by love’s first kiss.''

name: Narrator
line: ''She was locked away in a castle guarded by a terrible fire-breathing dragon. Many brave knights had attempted to free her from this dreadful prison, but none prevailed.''

name: Narrator
line: ''She waited in the dragon’s keep....in the highest room of the tallest tower for her true love....

name: Narrator
line: ''...and true love’s first kiss."

name: Shrek
line: Like that’s ever gonna happen. [It confirms that the man is in an outhouse] What a load of-- [toilet flushes]

name: Smash Mouth
line: "All Star"]

name: Smash Mouth
line: [singing] ♪ Somebody once told me the world is gonna roll me I ain’t the sharpest tool in the shed ♪ She was lookin’ kind of dumb with her finger and her thumb ♪ In the shape of an "L" on her forehead ♪ The years start comin’ and they don’t stop comin’ ♪ Fed to the rules and I hit the ground runnin’ ♪ Didn’t make sense not to live for fun ♪ Your brain gets smart but your head gets dumb ♪ So much to do ♪ So much to see ♪ So what’s wrong with takin’ the backstreets ♪ You’ll never know if you don’t go ♪ You’ll never shine if you don’t glow ♪ Hey, now ♪ You’re an all-star ♪ Get your game on, go play ♪ Hey, now, you’re a rock star ♪ Get the show b on, get paid ♪ And all that glitters is gold ♪ Only shootin’ stars break the mold ♪ It’s a cool place and they say it gets colder ♪ You’re bundled up now but wait till you get older ♪ But the meteor men beg to differ ♪ Judging by the hole in the satellite picture ♪ The ice we skate is gettin’ pretty thin ♪ The water’s getting warm so you might as well swim My world’s on fire ♪ How ‘bout yours ♪ That’s the way I like it and I’ll never get bored ♪ Hey now you’re an all-star [shouting] [singing] ♪ Get your game on, go play ♪ Hey, now, you’re a rock star ♪ Get the show on, get paid ♪ And all that glitters is gold ♪ Only shootin’ stars break the mold ♪

name: Shrek
line: [belches]

name: Smash Mouth
line: ♪ Go! Go! [record scratching] ♪ Go. Go. Go. [singing] ♪ Hey, now You’re an all-star ♪ Get your game on, go play ♪ Hey, now, you’re a rock star ♪ Get the show on, get paid ♪ And all that glitters is gold ♪ Only shootin’ stars break the mold ♪

name: Shrek
line: [Laughs] Yes, well, actually, that would be a giant. Now, ogres. They’re much worse. They’ll make a suit from your freshly peeled skin. (Ogre Hunter 4: No!) They’ll shave your liver. Squeeze the jelly from your eyes! Actually, it’s quite good on toast.

name: Shrek
line: [whispers] This is the part where you run away. (The men scramble to get away. He laughs.) And stay out! (looks down and picks up a piece of paper. It reads:) "Wanted. Fairy tale creatures". (He sighs and throws the paper over his shoulder. The next day)

name: Guard
line: All right. This one’s full. Take it away! Move it along. Come on! Get up!

name: Head guard
line: Next!

name: Guard
line: (taking the witch’s broom) Give me that! Your flying days are over. (breaks the broom in half)

name: Captain of the Guards
line: That’s 20 pieces of silver for the witch. Next!

name: Guard
line: Get up! Come on!

name: Captain of the Guards
line: 20 pieces.

name: Guard
line: [thudding] Sit down there! Keep quiet!

name: Little Bear
line: [crying] This cage is too small.

name: Donkey
line: Please, don’t turn me in. I’ll never be stubborn again. I can change. Please! Give me another chance!

name: Old Woman
line: Oh, shut up. (jerks his rope) Donkey: Oh!

name: Captain of the Guards
line: Next! What have you got?

name: Gepetto
line: This little wooden puppet.

name: Pinocchio
line: I’m not a puppet. I’m a real boy. (his nose grows)

name: Captain of the Guards
line: Five shillings for the possessed toy. Take it away.

name: Pinocchio
line: Father, please! Don’t let them do this! Help me!

name: Captain of the Guards
line: Next! What have you got?

name: Old Woman
line: Well, I’ve got a talking donkey.

name: Captain of the Guards
line: Right. Well, that’s good for ten shillings, if you can prove it.

name: Old Woman
line: Oh, go ahead, little fella. [Donkey just looks up at her.]

name: Captain of the Guards
line: Well?

name: Old Woman
line: Oh, oh, he’s just… he’s just a little nervous. He’s really quite a chatterbox. (to Donkey) Talk, you boneheaded dolt-!

name: Captain of the Guards
line: That’s it. I’ve heard enough. Guards!

name: Old Woman
line: No, no, he talks! He does. (pretends to be Donkey) I can talk. I love to talk. I’m the talkingest thing you ever saw.

name: Captain of the Guards
line: Get her out of my sight.

name: Old Woman
line: No, no! I swear! Oh! He can talk!

name: Donkey
line: Hey! I can fly!

name: Peter Pan
line: He can fly!

name: All
line: He can fly!

name: Captain of the Guards
line: He can talk!

name: Donkey
line: Ha, ha! That’s right, fool! Now I’m a flying, talking Donkey. You might have seen a housefly, maybe even a superfly, but I bet you ain’t never seen a Donkey fly. Ha, ha! (the pixie dust begins to wear off) Uh-oh. (he begins to sink to the ground.)

name: Captain of the Guards
line: Seize him! (Donkey takes off running.) After him!

name: Guards
line: He's getting away! Get him! This way! Turn! [Donkey keeps running and he eventually runs into Shrek. Literally. Shrek turns around to see who bumped into him. Donkey looks scared for a moment then he spots the guards coming up the path. He quickly hides behind Shrek.]

name: Captain of the Guards
line: You there. Ogre!

name: Shrek
line: Aye?

name: Captain of the Guards
line: By the order of Lord Farquaad [he opens a scroll revealing the Farquaad logo] I am authorized to place you both under arrest and transport you to a designated resettlement facility.

name: Shrek
line: Oh, really? You and what army?

name: Donkey
line: Can I say something to you? Listen, you was really, really, really somethin’ back here. Incredible!

name: Shrek
line: Are you talkin’ to…(he turns around and Donkey is gone) me? (he turns back around and Donkey is right in front of him.) Whoa!

name: Donkey
line: Yes. I was talkin’ to you. Can I tell you that you that you was great back here? Those guards! They thought they was all of that. Then you showed up, and bam! They was trippin’ over themselves like babes in the woods. That really made me feel good to see that.

name: Shrek
line: Oh, that’s great. Really.

name: Donkey
line: Man, it’s good to be free.

name: Shrek
line: Now, why don’t you go celebrate your freedom with your own friends? Hmm?

name: Donkey
line: But, uh, I don’t have any friends. And I’m not goin’ out there by myself.

name: Donkey
line: Hey, wait a minute! I got a great idea! I’ll stick with you. You’re mean, green, fightin’ machine. Together we’ll scare the spit out of anybody that crosses us.

name: Donkey
line: Oh, wow! That was really scary. If you don’t mind me sayin’, if that don’t work, your breath certainly will get the job done, ‘cause you definitely need some Tic Tacs or something, ‘cause you breath stinks!

name: Donkey
line: Man, you almost burned the hair outta my nose, just like the time…(Shrek covers his mouth but Donkey continues to talk, so Shrek removes his hand.) …then I ate some rottenberries. Man, I had some strong gases leaking out of my butt that day.

name: Shrek
line: Why are you following me?

name: Donkey
line: I'll tell you why. (singing) ♪ 'Cause I'm all alone ♪ There's no one here beside me ♪ My problems have all gone ♪ There's no one to deride me ♪ But you gotta have friends-- ♪

name: Shrek
line: Stop singing!!! It’s no wonder you don’t have any friends.

name: Donkey
line: Wow. Only a true friend would be that truly honest.

name: Shrek
line: Listen, little Donkey. Take a look at me. What am I?

name: Donkey
line: (looks all the way up at Shrek) Uhhhh... Really tall?

name: Shrek
line: No! I’m an ogre. You know. "Grab your torch and pitchforks." Doesn’t that bother you?

name: Donkey
line: Nope.

name: Shrek
line: Really?

name: Donkey
line: Really, really.

name: Shrek
line: Oh.

name: Donkey
line: Man, I like you. What’s your name?

name: Shrek
line: Uh, Shrek.

name: Donkey
line: Shrek? Well, you know what I like about you, Shrek? You got that kind of I-don’t-care-what-nobody-thinks-of-me thing. I like that. I respect that, Shrek. You all right. (They come over a hill and you can see Shrek’s cottage.) Whoa! Look at that. Who’d want to live in a place like that?

name: Shrek
line: That would be my home.

name: Donkey
line: Oh! And it is lovely! Just beautiful. You know you are quite a decorator. It’s amazing what you’ve done with such a modest budget. [he sees a boulder stuck on the grass] I like that boulder. That is a nice boulder. [he continues following Shrek] I guess you don’t entertain much, do you?

name: Shrek
line: I like my privacy.

name: Donkey
line: You know, I do too. That’s another thing we have in common. Like I hate it when you got somebody in your face. You’ve trying to give them a hint, and they won’t leave. There’s that awkward silence, you know. (awkward silence) Can I stay with you?

name: Shrek
line: Uh, what?

name: Donkey
line: Can I stay with you, please?

name: Shrek
line: (sarcastically) Of course!

name: Donkey
line: Really?

name: Shrek
line: No.

name: Donkey
line: Please! I don’t wanna go back there! You don’t know what it’s like to be considered a freak! (pause while he looks at Shrek) Well, maybe you do. But that’s why we gotta stick together. You gotta let me stay! Please! Please!

name: Shrek
line: Okay! Okay! (as he opens the door) But one night only.

name: Donkey
line: Ah! Thank you! (he runs inside the cottage)

name: Shrek
line: What are you....? No! No!

name: Donkey
line: (he hops up onto the chair) This is gonna be fun! We can stay up late, swappin’ manly stories, and in the mornin’ I’m makin’ waffles.

name: Shrek
line: (growling) Oh!

name: Donkey
line: Where do, uh, I sleep?

name: Shrek
line: (irritated) Outside!

name: Donkey
line: Oh, well, I guess that’s cool. I mean, I don’t know you, and you don’t know me, so I guess outside is best, you know. Here I go. Good night. (Shrek slams the door.) (sigh) I mean, I do like the outdoors. I’m a Donkey. I was born outside. I’ll just be sitting by myself outside, I guess, you know. By myself, outside. ♪ I’m all alone…there’s no one here beside me… ♪

name: Shrek
line: (to Donkey) I thought I told you to stay outside.

name: Donkey
line: (from the window) I am outside.

name: Gorder
line: (bouncing on a slug) What a lovely bed.

name: Shrek
line: Got ya. (Grabs a mouse, but it escapes and lands on his shoulder.)

name: Gorder
line: (sniffs) I found some cheese. (bites Shrek’s ear)

name: Shrek
line: Ow!

name: Gorder
line: Bleah! Awful stuff!

name: Gorder
line: How did you know?

name: Shrek
line: Enough! (he grabs the 3 mice) What are you doing in my house? (He gets bumped from behind and he drops the mice.) Hey! (he turns and sees the Seven Dwarves with Snow White on the table.) Oh, no, no, no. Dead girl off the table.

name: Dwarf
line: Where are we supposed to put her? The bed’s taken.

name: Shrek
line: Huh?

name: Big Bad Wolf
line: What?

name: Shrek
line: I live in a swamp. I put up signs. I'm a terrifying ogre! What do I have to do to get a little privacy?

name: Big Bad Wolf
line: Aaaah!

name: Shrek
line: Oh, no. Oh, no. No! No!

name: Fairy Godmother
line: [gasping] Oh, dear!

name: Dwarf
line: Whoa!

name: Donkey
line: Hey, don’t look at me. I didn’t invite them.

name: Pinocchio
line: Oh, gosh, no one invited us.

name: Shrek
line: What?

name: Pinocchio
line: We were forced to come here.

name: Shrek
line: (flabbergasted) By who?

name: Shrek
line: (heavy sigh) All right. Who knows where this Farquaad guy is?

name: Donkey
line: Oh, I do! I know where he is!

name: Shrek
line: Does anyone else know where to find him? Anyone at all?

name: Donkey
line: Me! Me!

name: Shrek
line: Anyone?

name: Donkey
line: Oh! Oh, pick me! Oh, I know! I know! Me, me!

name: Donkey
line: All right, that’s what I like to hear, man. Shrek and Donkey, two stalwart friends, off on a whirlwind big-city adventure. I love it! ♪ On the road again. ♪ Sing it with me, Shrek. ♪ I can’t wait to get on the road again. ♪

name: Shrek
line: What did I say about singing?

name: Donkey
line: Can I whistle?

name: Shrek
line: No.

name: Donkey
line: Can I hum it?

name: Shrek
line: All right, hum it.

name: GINGERBREAD MAN
line: Okay, I’ll tell you. (they recite the famous Muffin Man Nursery Rhyme) Do you know the muffin man?

name: Shrek
line: It’s quiet. Too quiet. Where is everybody?

name: Donkey
line: Hey, look at this!

name: Clockwork Chorus
line: Welcome to DuLoc, such a perfect town. Here we have some rules, let us lay them down. Don’t make waves, stay in line and we’ll get along fine. DuLoc is perfect place! Please keep off of the grass. Shine your shoes, wipe your… face! DuLoc is, DuLoc is, DuLoc is a perfect... place!

name: Donkey
line: Wow! Let’s do that again! (makes ready to run over and pull the lever again)

name: Shrek
line: (grabs Donkey’s tail and holds him still) No! No! No, no, no! No.

name: Shrek
line: Exactly the way it was?

name: Farquaad
line: Down to the last slime-covered toadstool.

name: Shrek
line: And the squatters?

name: Farquaad
line: As good as gone.

name: Shrek
line: What kind of quest?

name: Donkey
line: Let me get this straight. You’re gonna go fight a dragon and rescue a princess just so Farquaad will give you back a swamp which you only don’t have because he filled it full of freaks in the first place. Is that about right?

name: Shrek
line: You know, maybe there’s a good reason Donkeys shouldn't talk.

name: Donkey
line: I don’t get it. Why don’t you just pull some of that ogre stuff on him? Throttle him, lay siege to his fortress, grinds his bones to make your bread, the whole ogre trip.

name: Shrek
line: Oh, I know what. Maybe I could have decapitated an entire village… and put their heads on a pike, gotten a knife, cut open their spleen and drink their fluids. Does that sound good to you?

name: Donkey
line: Uh, no, not really, no.

name: Shrek
line: For your information, there’s a lot more to ogres than people think.

name: Donkey
line: Example?

name: Shrek
line: Example? Okay, um, ogres are like onions. (he holds out his onion)

name: Donkey
line: (sniffs the onion) They stink?

name: Shrek
line: Yes-- No!

name: Donkey
line: Oh, they make you cry?

name: Shrek
line: No!

name: Donkey
line: Oh, you leave them in the sun, they get all brown, start sproutin’ little white hairs.

name: Shrek
line: No! Layers! Onions have layers. Ogres have layers! Onions have layers. You get it? We both have layers. (he heaves a sigh and then walks off)

name: Donkey
line: (trailing after Shrek) Oh, you both have layers. Oh. (sniffs the onion) You know, not everybody likes onions. Cake! Everybody loves cakes! Cakes have layers.

name: Shrek
line: I don’t care… what everyone likes. Ogres are not like cakes.

name: Donkey
line: You know what else everybody likes? Parfaits. Have you ever met a person, you say, "Hey, let’s get some parfait," they say, "Hell no, I don’t like no parfait"? Parfaits are delicious.

name: Shrek
line: NO! YOU DENSE, IRRITATING, MINIATURE BEAST OF BURDEN! OGRES ARE LIKE ONIONS! End of story! Bye-bye! See ya later!

name: Donkey
line: Parfaits may be the most delicious thing on the whole stupid planet.

name: Shrek
line: You know, I think I preferred your humming.

name: Donkey
line: Do you have a tissue or something? I’m making a mess. Just the word parfait make me start slobbering.

name: The Proclaimers
line: "I’m On My Way"]

name: Shrek
line: Really, really.

name: Donkey
line: Okay, don’t look down. Don’t look down. Don’t look down. Keep on moving. Don’t look down. (he steps through a rotting board and ends up looking straight down into the lava) [Gasps] Shrek! I’m lookin’ down! AAH! Oh, God, I can’t do this! Just let me off right now, please!

name: Donkey
line: You afraid?

name: Shrek
line: No. But… Shh

name: Shrek
line: Well, at least we know where the princess is, but where’s the--

name: Donkey
line: DRAGON!

name: Fiona
line: Oh! Oh!

name: Shrek
line: Wake up!

name: Fiona
line: What?

name: Shrek
line: Are you Princess Fiona?

name: Fiona
line: I am, awaiting a knight so bold as to rescue me.

name: Shrek
line: Oh, that’s nice. Now let’s go!

name: Shrek
line: You’ve had a lot of time to plan this, haven’t you?

name: Fiona
line: (smiles) Mm-hmm.

name: Fiona
line: But we have to savor this moment! You could recite an epic poem for me. A ballad? A sonnet! A limerick? Or something!

name: Shrek
line: I don’t think so.

name: Shrek
line: Thanks!

name: Fiona
line: What kind of knight are you?

name: Donkey
line: Hi, Princess!

name: Fiona
line: It talks!

name: Shrek
line: RUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUN!

name: Fiona
line: But how will you kiss me?

name: Donkey
line: Maybe it’s a perk.

name: Fiona
line: Well, yes.

name: Fiona
line: Of course, you are. You’re my rescuer. Now.... Now remove your helmet.

name: Shrek
line: Look. I really don’t think this is a good idea.

name: Fiona
line: Just take off the helmet.

name: Shrek
line: I’m not going to.

name: Shrek
line: Okay! Easy. As your command. Your Highness. (takes off his helmet revealing his face but smudged in a charcoal-like substance)

name: Fiona
line: You.... You’re a.... an ogre?

name: Fiona
line: Agh! Put me down, or you will suffer the consequences! This is not dignified! Put me down! AAAAARRRRRRGGHH!!!

name: Fiona
line: Stop it. Stop it, both of you. You’re just jealous you can never measure up to a great ruler like Lord Farquaad.

name: Shrek
line: Hey! Over here.

name: Shrek
line: What’s all this about?

name: Shrek
line: Princess!

name: Donkey
line: Blue flower, red thorns. Blue flower, red thorns. Blue flower, red thorns. This would be so much easier if I wasn’t color-blind! Blue flower, red thorns.

name: Shrek
line: (os) Ow!

name: Donkey
line: Hold on, Shrek! I’m comin’! (rips a flower off a nearby bush that just happens to be a blue flower with red thorns)

name: Shrek
line: Ow! Not good.

name: Eels
line: "My Beloved Monster"]

name: Fiona
line: I guess I’ll be dining a little differently tomorrow night.

name: Shrek
line: Um, Princess?

name: Fiona
line: Yes, Shrek?

name: Donkey
line: It’s very spooky in here. I ain’t playing no games.

name: Donkey
line: Aaaah!

name: Fiona
line: No, no!

name: Donkey
line: No, help!

name: Fiona
line: Shh!

name: Donkey
line: Shrek! Shrek! Shrek!

name: Fiona
line: No, it’s okay. It’s okay.

name: Donkey
line: What did you do with the princess?

name: Fiona
line: Donkey, shh! I’m the princess.

name: Donkey
line: Aah!

name: Fiona
line: It’s me, in this body.

name: Donkey
line: Oh, my God! You ate the princess. (to her stomach) Can you hear me?

name: Fiona
line: Donkey!

name: Donkey
line: (still aimed at her stomach) Listen, keep breathing! I’ll get you out of there!

name: Fiona
line: No!

name: Donkey
line: Shrek! Shrek! Shrek!

name: Fiona
line: Shh.

name: Donkey
line: Shrek!

name: Fiona
line: This is me.

name: Donkey
line: (he looks into her eyes as she pets his muzzle, and he quiets down.) Princess? What happened to you? You’re, uh, uh, uh, different.

name: Fiona
line: I’m ugly, okay?

name: Donkey
line: Well, yeah! Was it something you ate? ‘Cause I told Shrek those rats was a bad idea. You are what you eat, I said. Now....

name: Fiona
line: No. I.... I’ve been this way as long as I can remember.

name: Donkey
line: What do you mean? Look, I ain’t never seen you like this before.

name: Fiona
line: It only happens when sun goes down. "By night one way, by day another. This shall be the norm… until you find true love’s first kiss… and then take love’s true form."

name: Donkey
line: Ah, that’s beautiful. I didn’t know you wrote poetry.

name: Fiona
line: Shrek?

name: Fiona
line: Shrek. Are you all right?

name: Shrek
line: Perfect! Never been better.

name: Fiona
line: I.... I don’t.... There’s something I have to tell you.

name: Shrek
line: You don’t have to tell me anything, Princess. I heard enough last night.

name: Fiona
line: You heard what I said?

name: Shrek
line: Every word.

name: Fiona
line: I thought you’d understand.

name: Donkey
line: What’d I miss? What’d I miss? (he spots the soldiers, mumbling to himself.) Who said that? Couldn’t have been the Donkey.

name: Farquaad
line: Princess Fiona.

name: Shrek
line: As promised. Now hand it over.

name: Fiona
line: No, you’re right. It doesn’t.

name: Donkey
line: Shrek, what are you doing? You’re letting her get away.

name: Shrek
line: Yeah? So what?

name: Donkey
line: Shrek, there’s something about her you don’t know. Look, I talked to her last night, She’s....

name: Shrek
line: I know you talked to her last night. You’re great pals, aren’t ya? Now, if you two are such good friends, why don’t you follow her home?

name: Donkey
line: Shrek, I.... I wanna go with you.

name: Shrek
line: I told you, didn’t I? You’re not coming home with me. I live alone! My swamp! Me! Nobody else! Understand? Nobody! Especially useless, pathetic, annoying, talking Donkeys!

name: Donkey
line: But I thought....

name: Shrek
line: Yeah. You know what? You thought wrong! (stomps off)

name: Donkey
line: Shrek.

name: John Cale
line: "Hallelujah"]

name: Shrek
line: Donkey? (as Donkey ignores him and continues with what he’s doing.) What are you doing?

name: Donkey
line: I would think, of all people, you would recognize a wall when you see one.

name: Shrek
line: Well, yeah. But the wall’s supposed to go around my swamp, not through it.

name: Donkey
line: It is around your half. See that’s your half, and this is my half.

name: Shrek
line: Oh! Your half. Hmm.

name: Donkey
line: Yes, my half. I helped rescue the princess. I did half the work. I get half the booty. Now hand me that big old rock, the one that looks like your head.

name: Shrek
line: (grabs the tree branch Donkey is working with) Back off!

name: Donkey
line: No, you back off!

name: Shrek
line: This is my swamp!

name: Donkey
line: Our swamp!

name: Shrek
line: Let go, Donkey!

name: Donkey
line: You let go!

name: Shrek
line: Stubborn stupid!

name: Donkey
line: Smelly ogre!

name: Shrek
line: Fine! (drops the tree branch and walks away)

name: Donkey
line: Hey, hey, come back here. I’m not through with you yet.

name: Shrek
line: Well, I’m through with you.

name: Donkey
line: Uh-uh. You know, with you it’s always, "Me, me, me!" Well, guess what! Now it’s my turn! So you just shut up and pay attention! You are mean to me. You insult me and you don’t appreciate anything that I do! You’re always pushing me around or pushing me away.

name: Shrek
line: Oh, yeah? Well, if I treated you so bad, how come you came back?

name: Donkey
line: Because that’s what friends do! They forgive each other!

name: Shrek
line: Oh, yeah. You’re right, Donkey. I forgive you… for stabbin’ me in the back! (goes into the outhouse and slams the door)

name: Donkey
line: Ohh! You’re so wrapped up in layers, onion boy, you’re afraid of your own feelings.

name: Shrek
line: (os) Go away!

name: Donkey
line: There you are, doing it again just like you did to Fiona. All she ever do was like you, maybe even love you.

name: Shrek
line: (os) Love me? She said I was ugly, a hideous creature. I heard the two of you talking.

name: Donkey
line: She wasn’t talkin’ about you. She was talkin’ about, uh, somebody else.

name: Shrek
line: (opens the door and comes out) She wasn’t talking about me? Well, then who was she talking about?

name: Donkey
line: Uh-uh, no way. I ain’t saying anything. You don’t wanna listen to me. Right? Right?

name: Shrek
line: Donkey!

name: Donkey
line: No!

name: Shrek
line: Okay, look. I’m sorry, all right? (sigh) I’m sorry. I guess I am just a big, stupid, ugly ogre. Can you forgive me?

name: Donkey
line: Hey, that’s what friends are for, right?

name: Shrek
line: Right. Friends?

name: Donkey
line: Friends.

name: Shrek
line: So, um, what did Fiona say about me?

name: Donkey
line: What are you asking me for? Why don’t you just go ask her?

name: Shrek
line: The wedding! We’ll never make it in time!

name: Donkey
line: Ha-ha-ha! Never fear, for where, there’s a will, there’s a way and I have a way. (whistles)

name: Shrek
line: Donkey?

name: Donkey
line: I guess it’s just my animal magnetism.

name: Shrek
line: Aw, come here, you. (gives Donkey a noogie)

name: Bishop
line: People of DuLoc, we gather here today to bear witness to the union….

name: Fiona
line: (eyeing the setting sun) Um....

name: Bishop
line: …of our new king…

name: Fiona
line: Excuse me. Could we just skip ahead to the "I do’s"?

name: Farquaad
line: (chuckles and then motions to the priest to indulge Fiona) Go on.
